name: Balance (itch) (ritonun)
description:
Game made for the mini jam #97.

- - 

"Gravity is what make objects fall"

Your mission will be to shoot all the objects falling down the screen, in order to keep the balance full, and avoid having the red ball fall, and thus move. 

Control

Left mouse click - shoot

SPACE - mute music

Credits

All the code, assets, music, sound were created during this jam by me. 

Font - Gameplay.ttf by Geronimo Font.

Music created with BeepBox.co.

SFX generated with SFXR.

Sprite created with aseprite.

Game written in python with pygame library from scratch.
